verses.verse: Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to Saul,<WH7586> "Yahweh<WH3068> sent<WH7971> me to anoint<WH4886> you to be king<WH4428> over his people,<WH5971> over Israel.<WH3478> Now therefore listen<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of the words<WH1697> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> <WH6485> 'I have marked that which Amalek<WH6002> did<WH6213> to Israel,<WH3478> how he set<WH7760> himself against him in the way,<WH1870> when he came up<WH5927> out of Egypt.<WH4714>

Now go<WH3212> and strike<WH5221> Amalek,<WH6002> and utterly destroy<WH2763> all that they have,<WH2550> and don't spare them;<WH4191> but kill both man<WH376> and woman,<WH802> infant<WH5768> and nursing<WH3243> baby,<WH7794> ox and sheep,<WH7716> camel<WH1581> and donkey.<WH2543>'"

Saul<WH7586> summoned<WH8085> the<WH8085> people,<WH5971> and numbered<WH6485> them in Telaim,<WH2923> two hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> footmen,<WH7273> and ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> men<WH7273> of Judah.<WH3063>
Saul<WH7586> came<WH935> to the city<WH5892> of Amalek,<WH6002> and laid wait<WH7378> in the valley.<WH5158>

Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> to the Kenites,<WH7017> "Go,<WH3212> depart,<WH5493> go down<WH3381> from among<WH8432> the Amalekites,<WH6002> lest I destroy<WH622> you with them;<WH6213> for you showed kindness<WH2617> to all the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> when they came up<WH5927> out of Egypt.<WH4714>" So the Kenites<WH7017> departed<WH5493> from among<WH8432> the Amalekites.<WH6003>
Saul<WH7586> struck<WH5221> the Amalekites,<WH6002> from Havilah<WH2341> as you go<WH935> to Shur,<WH7793> that is before<WH6440> Egypt.<WH4714>
He took<WH8610> Agag<WH90> the king<WH4428> of the Amalekites<WH6002> alive,<WH2416> and utterly destroyed<WH2763> all the people<WH5971> with the edge<WH6310> of the sword.<WH2719>

But Saul<WH7586> and the people<WH5971> spared<WH2550> Agag,<WH90> and the best<WH4315> of the sheep,<WH6629> and of the cattle,<WH1241> and of the fatlings,<WH4932> and the lambs,<WH3733> and all that was good,<WH2896> and wouldn't<WH14> utterly destroy<WH2763> them:<WH4399> but everything that was vile<WH5240> and refuse,<WH4549> that they destroyed utterly.<WH2763>
Then the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to Samuel,<WH8050> saying,<WH559>

"It grieves<WH5162> me that I have set up<WH4427> Saul<WH7586> to be king;<WH4428> for he is turned back<WH7725> from following<WH310> me,<WH6965> and has not performed my commandments.<WH1697>" Samuel<WH8050> was angry;<WH2734> and he cried<WH2199> to Yahweh<WH3068> all night.<WH3915>

Samuel<WH8050> rose early<WH7925> to meet<WH7125> Saul<WH7586> in the morning;<WH1242> and it was told<WH5046> Samuel,<WH8050> saying,<WH559> "Saul<WH7586> came<WH935> to Carmel,<WH3760> and behold,<WH5324> he set up a monument<WH3027> for himself,<WH5437> and turned, and passed on,<WH5674> and went down<WH3381> to Gilgal.<WH1537>"
Samuel<WH8050> came<WH935> to Saul;<WH7586> and Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> to him,<WH1288> "You are blessed by Yahweh!<WH3068> I have performed<WH6965> the commandment<WH1697> of Yahweh.<WH3068>"
Samuel<WH8050> said,<WH559> "Then what does this bleating<WH6963> of the sheep<WH6629> in my ears,<WH241> and the lowing<WH6963> of the cattle<WH1241> which I hear mean?<WH8085>"

Saul<WH7586> said,<WH559> "They have brought<WH935> them from the Amalekites;<WH6003> for the people<WH5971> spared<WH2550> the best<WH4315> of the sheep<WH6629> and of the cattle,<WH1241> to sacrifice<WH2076> to Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430> We have utterly destroyed<WH2763> the rest.<WH3498>"
Then Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to Saul,<WH7586> "Stay,<WH7503> and I will tell<WH5046> you what Yahweh<WH3068> has said<WH1696> to me last night.<WH3915>" He said<WH1696> to him,<WH1696> "Say on."

Samuel<WH8050> said,<WH559> "Though you were little<WH6996> in your own sight,<WH5869> weren't<WH7218> you made the head of the tribes<WH7626> of Israel?<WH3478> Yahweh<WH3068> anointed<WH4886> you king<WH4428> over Israel;<WH3478>

and Yahweh<WH3068> sent<WH7971> you on a journey,<WH1870> and said,<WH559> <WH3212> 'Go, and utterly destroy<WH2763> the sinners<WH2400> the Amalekites,<WH6002> and fight<WH3898> against them until they are consumed.<WH3615>'
Why then didn't<WH8085> you obey the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh,<WH3068> but took<WH5860> the spoils,<WH7998> and did<WH6213> that which was evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of Yahweh?<WH3068>"

Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> to Samuel,<WH8050> "But I have obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and have gone<WH3212> the way<WH1870> which Yahweh<WH3068> sent<WH7971> me,<WH935> and have brought Agag<WH90> the king<WH4428> of Amalek,<WH6002> and have utterly destroyed<WH2763> the Amalekites.<WH6002>

But the people<WH5971> took<WH3947> of the spoil,<WH7998> sheep<WH6629> and cattle,<WH1241> the chief<WH7225> of the devoted<WH2764> things,<WH2076> to sacrifice to Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> in Gilgal.<WH1537>"

Samuel<WH8050> said,<WH559> "Has Yahweh<WH3068> as great delight<WH2656> in burnt offerings<WH5930> and sacrifices,<WH2077> as in obeying<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh?<WH3068> Behold,<WH8085> to obey is better<WH2896> than sacrifice,<WH2077> and to listen<WH8085> than the fat<WH2459> of rams.<WH352>

For rebellion<WH4805> is as the sin<WH2403> of witchcraft,<WH7081> and stubbornness<WH6484> is as idolatry<WH8655> and teraphim.<WH205> Because you have rejected<WH3988> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> he has also rejected<WH3988> you from being king.<WH4428>"

Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> to Samuel,<WH8050> "I have sinned;<WH2398> for I have transgressed<WH5674> the commandment<WH6310> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and your words,<WH1697> because I feared<WH3372> the people,<WH5971> and obeyed<WH8085> their voice.<WH6963>
Now therefore,<WH5375> please pardon my sin,<WH2403> and turn again<WH7725> with me,<WH7812> that I may worship Yahweh.<WH3068>"

Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to Saul,<WH7586> "I will not return<WH7725> with you;<WH3988> for you have rejected the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and Yahweh<WH3068> has rejected<WH3988> you from being king<WH4428> over Israel.<WH3478>"
As Samuel<WH8050> turned about<WH5437> to go away,<WH3212> Saul grabbed<WH2388> the skirt<WH3671> of his robe,<WH4598> and it tore.<WH7167>

Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to him,<WH3068> "Yahweh has torn<WH7167> the kingdom<WH4468> of Israel<WH3478> from you this day,<WH3117> and has given<WH5414> it to a neighbor<WH7453> of yours who is better than you.<WH2896>
Also the Strength<WH5331> of Israel<WH3478> will not lie<WH8266> nor repent;<WH5162> for he is not a man,<WH120> that he should repent.<WH5162>"

Then he said,<WH559> "I have sinned:<WH2398> yet please honor<WH3513> me now before the elders<WH2205> of my people,<WH5971> and before Israel,<WH3478> and come back<WH7725> with me,<WH7812> that I may worship Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>"
So Samuel<WH8050> went back<WH7725> with<WH310> Saul;<WH7586> and Saul<WH7586> worshiped<WH7812> Yahweh.<WH3068>

Then Samuel<WH8050> said,<WH559> "Bring here<WH5066> to me Agag<WH90> the king<WH4428> of the Amalekites!<WH6002>" Agag<WH90> came<WH3212> to him cheerfully.<WH4574> Agag<WH90> said,<WH559> "Surely<WH403> the bitterness<WH4751> of death<WH4194> is past.<WH5493>"

Samuel<WH8050> said,<WH559> "As your sword<WH2719> has made women<WH802> childless,<WH7921> so your mother<WH517> will be childless<WH7921> among women!<WH802>" Samuel<WH8050> cut<WH8158> Agag<WH90> in pieces<WH8158> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> in Gilgal.<WH1537>
Then Samuel<WH8050> went<WH3212> to Ramah;<WH7414> and Saul<WH7586> went up<WH5927> to his house<WH1004> to Gibeah<WH1390> of Saul.<WH7586>

Samuel<WH8050> came no more<WH3254> to see<WH7200> Saul<WH7586> until the day<WH3117> of his death;<WH4194> for<WH3588> Samuel<WH8050> mourned<WH56> for Saul:<WH7586> and Yahweh<WH3068> grieved<WH5162> that he had made Saul<WH7586> king<WH4427> over Israel.<WH3478>
